reviewText: My purchase of this DVD was mainly for the film, "Crazy People".  It has been a family favourite for years.  In fact, when family members are in the car together and someone spots a Volvo it immediately elicits..."Buy a Volvo, They're Boxy But Good" from the movie.Best Defense was a new one for me but still quite enjoyable.
summary: Great Fun!  Dudley Moore at his best.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This 2-pack movie DVD was a disappointment. Poor Dudley Moore suffered through these cheesy 80's clunkers. You're not going to find the best of him here. For that, save your money and look up anything by "Derek & Clive" or the original "Bedazzled" along with Peter Cook. That's when Dudley was shining at his comedic best.
Title: N/A

reviewText: You have to be a Dudley Moore fan for this.  Personally I am.  He has the most amazing talent and that is getting you to know him well.  These movies have to be the best fun you will spend watching and sitting for a few hours.  Prepare to laugh hysterically and see the other side of life from a British person's point of view.  If like me, you will see no wrong in Crazy People, even adopting the phrases you hear as your own.  lol  I would highly recommend this package.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this for Crazy People - Best Defense was an added bargain.If you enjoy Dudley Moore, this is well worth it (and the price was good).
Title: N/A

reviewText: These two movies are some of the best written and acted comedies from the Eighties. Dudley Moore shines as the put upon everyman in both films. Why should you care? Because Caucasians are just too damned tall.
summary: Two Great Movies from Dudley Moore
Title: N/A
